meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by my first-year geography course and unsure if I can keep up
meeting_request.description: Hi, my name is Richard and I'm a first-year student in the geography major. I’ve taken a few classes so far, including anthropology and geography. Both of these courses are really interesting, but I’m finding it hard to keep up with the content and the pace. I’m still in college, and I’m still trying to figure out what I want to do with my major. I feel like I’m already falling behind, and I don’t know if I can keep doing this on my own. I’m also dealing with some personal stress from school and family issues, and I’m not sure if I’m handling it well. I’m interested in talking with someone about how to manage my academic load and my mental health, and I think this is a good opportunity.
